record.dc:title: 122BT10, 15BT10, Butler, Kentucky. Read Site. Feature No. 91.
record.wpa:narrative: Feature 91, looking north. A pit with three fire reddened stone slabs, one of which (in foreground, broken) appears to be a metate (F.S 155) and a cannon bone awl (to the right of this) (F.S 146).
